TopicTitle: City Lights are turned on during daylight when im in orbit with Astronomer Visual Pack on Kerbal 1.10.1

Articles.Content: I can see city lights from orbit during daylight, this kinda ruin a bit the experience..  is there some configurations to use for fix the issue? City lights appears black when in orbit, at like 300\350km above the surface. Thanks in advice
